channel.title: Marian Sabat on Sabat
channel.description: Recent content in Marian Sabat on Sabat

item.title: My chess program post mortem
item.description: Ok, I would be lying if I said that this is my first-ever program written in C++. But I will be counting this one as first. So what is this program about? I wanted to make a simple chess game so I can learn C++. Of course, at the beginning, I overestimated my knowledge. But let’s start from the start. What I wanted to do Link to heading Initially, I wanted to create a fully working chess game in the terminal.

item.title: How to set up simple website with hugo
item.description: Here is the problem, I want a website where I can put what ever I want. I could write it from scratch but I don’t have time nor desire to do that. Not to mention that my design and css skill is abysmal. So obvious answer is to use some tool that will create web for you. One of such tools is Hugo. This is step by step how have I created this website.
